nodes.text: The Ottega Dawn was an Ithorian Herdship. It shared a portion of its name with the primary star of the Ithorian homeworld.

During the Clone Wars, the Ottega Dawn was captured by the Confederacy of Independent Systems, who placed it at the fore of their assault force, assuming that the Republic ships would not fire upon a ship with a large number of civilian passengers and crew aboard.
While the tactic was initially successful, it backfired when the ship was retaken by a group of Ithorian mutineers, which included the brothers Bulduga and Onca.
